title: Who is Marco Paret and what are his unique qualifications in modern disciplines such as PNL, hypnosis, coaching, counseling, and leadership, as well as his linguistic expertise?
first_phrase: In this text of about 200 tokens, the author describes Dr. Paret, who is an expert in modern disciplines such as NLP and hypnosis. He is recognised as one of the leading authorities and Master Trainer on these techniques, having studied and researched them for decades. What sets him apart is his ability to combine this knowledge with a direct and secret chain of powerful wisdom transmitted over thousands of years. Dr. Paret has used his techniques to develop a modern, practicable paradigm for therapy, personal development, coaching, education, and business. He has trained executives of companies like Ferrari, Deutsche Bank, and Telecom, and is a founder and director of the International Institute ISI-CNV. Also known for his expertise in linguistics, Dr. Paret has invented a unique method for learning languages that he has used successfully on himself.
content: Poichè ama praticare quello che dice, ha utilizzato le tecniche di creatività e di sviluppo della persona da lui stesso insegnate per sviluppare un paradigma modernissimo unitario, estremamente semplice e nello stesso tempo estremamente pratico per la terapia, lo sviluppo personale, il coaching, l'educazione ed il business (tra le principali applicazioni). E' conosciuto per i suoi risultati istantanei nella terapia, inoltre ha tenuto personalmente coaching e formazioni per aziende del calibro di Ferrari (auto) - Deutsche Bank - Marzotto (France) - Telecom e altre ancora... Per diffondere le sue conoscenze è anche il fondatore e Direttore dell’Istituto Internazionale ISI-CNV di PNL (Programmazione Neuro-Linguistica), Ipnosi, CNV (Comunicazione Non Verbale), Leadership e Coaching (ha anche organizzato due Conferenze Internazionali di Coaching). Il dr. Paret utilizza inoltre specifiche strategie di installazione per aiutare i suoi allievi ad imparare l'autoipnosi o cambiare comportamenti. Il dr. Paret tra gli esperti di neurolinguistica è tra quelli che conoscono effettivamente la linguistica. La passione per la linguistica del dr. Paret lo ha portato infatti ad inventare un metodo suo proprio per l'apprendimento delle lingue che primo su tutti ha applicato su sé stesso.
last_phrase: In conclusion, Dr. Marco Paret's passion for linguistics and dedication to personal development has led to the creation of an innovative and practical paradigm for therapy, personal growth, coaching, education, and business. Through his proven techniques and strategies, he has achieved instant results in therapy and provided coaching and training for leading companies. His expertise in neurolinguistics and mastery of multiple languages have made him a top-notch trainer and developer of new models and paradigms in PNL. Overall, his methods have been effective and are highly recommended for anyone seeking to improve their personal development, communication skills, or professional success.
